Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-27282 affecting package ruby for versions less than 3.3.3-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-27282 affecting package ruby for versions less than 3.3.3-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package ruby is earlier than 3.3.3-1, affected by CVE-2024-27282
